entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,704Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 77

Summary: Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.~*~An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he‚Äôs gripping the woman‚Äôs arm too tightly, but he can‚Äôt seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There‚Äôs beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,938Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 43

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power‚Äîand its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he‚Äôs determined to protect the Stilinski legacy‚Äîeven without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family‚Äîfeared for their near-feral strength‚Äîemerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox‚Äôs cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,764Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 105

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There‚Äôs an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: After
entry.summary:
Author: whumprec24

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,230Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Stiles thought that after they beat the Nogitsune that everything would go back to normal, or as close to normal as it could in Beacon Hills, so like a couple of months of catching up on sleep and homework until they found the next supernatural threat or it found them. Only it didn't quite work out like that. There was the sorrow and relief the first couple of weeks. A haze of memorials, sad smiles and hesitant touches. But those faded after a while. Stiles could see the slight flinches whenever he came too close, the way eyes briefly wandered over him as though looking for a slip up, a first sign of threat until they looked away pretending nothing was amiss. But Stiles could feel it. The cloud of darkness that hung over them all. It was Him. A reminder of all they'd lost, the terror they'd all experienced. Even boxed up and buried, the Nogitsune had won. It had twisted the love he and the pack had had for each other into twisted hate and fear that none of them knew how to eradicate. But Stiles knew what to do. He would do what they always did when faced with a threat, a monster. He would neutralize it. Only this time the monster was him.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,320Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 65

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren‚Äôt the only danger, here‚Äôs hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

Summary: Beacon Hills was eerily silent.It wasn‚Äôt the kind of silence that comes before a storm, nor the hush of a forest at dusk. It was a void. As if something had been ripped out of the world‚Ä¶ and no one could remember what.Scott noticed it first. Lydia felt it in her bones. Malia smelt it in the air. But no one could name it. No one could say what was missing.Except Derek. From the moment he crossed the town‚Äôs border, he knew something essential was gone. He couldn‚Äôt explain it, couldn‚Äôt name it, but he felt it like an open wound. And he wouldn‚Äôt stop until he discovered what‚Äîor who‚Äîhad been erased from the world.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------üí≠What if the pack had called Derek during the Ghost Riders disaster in season 6A? Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. entry.title: A Second Chance
entry.summary:
Author: Romantific

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,623Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 115

Summary: While working for the FBI Melinda Stilinski (Fem Stiles) gets the call that Derek is dead. In a fit of Grief she rushes home to Beacon Hills and finds herself at the Nemeton where she is offered a choice. Will that choice be enough to fix the future? Tune in to find out. (Aged up Stiles Stilinski. Melinda is 17 not 16. Also Aged down Derek, he‚Äôs going to be 20) time-travel.Chapter 1: Edited.
